title: In Ghislaine Maxwell Trial, Jeffrey Epstein’s Former House Manager Gives Glimpse Into Life Inside His Estate
sub_head: Prosecutors alleged that Ms. Maxwell created a culture of silence as she helped Epstein traffic and abuse young girls
body:
Disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein and British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell had a strict rule for employees at his Palm Beach, Fla., estate: “See nothing, hear nothing, say nothing.”
That instruction, and many more, were included in a household manual for workers that federal prosecutors showed as an exhibit at Ms. Maxwell’s sex-trafficking trial on Thursday.
